summary: This release introduces exciting new features like the unified AI gateway for smarter content, a brand new Gallery for image management, and automated system monitoring to keep everything running smoothly. We've also made significant improvements to our testing infrastructure and fixed several bugs to enhance stability. Overall, this update focuses on building a more robust and visually rich platform for your blogs.
